definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: During his stay in Paris, he did many TVC and commercial advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎期間拍攝多部電視廣告片和商業宣傳片。

sentences.english: Promos development speed fast, and has an amazing potential.
sentences.chinese: 廣告片發展速度極快，並具有驚人的發展潛力。
腦白金的廣告片很“土”吧？

sentences.english: It also offers conveniences for enterprises to choose dubbing staff for promos and promotion video.
sentences.chinese: 爲企業廣告片和宣傳片選定配音員，提供了方便。

definition: lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
to heave a sigh of relief
precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
to touch on sth and leave it there/to take care not to overdo sth
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
